pkgmetadata.longdescription: Median Bias Reduction in Binomial-Response GLMs // Fit generalized linear models with binomial responses using a median modified score approach (Kenne Pagui et al., 2016, https://arxiv.org/abs/1604.04768) to median bias reduction. This method respects equivariance under reparameterizations for each parameter component and also solves the infinite estimates problem (data separation).
